title: degika
author: degika
content: I am selling another casino software which is works perfect.There is already includedPlinko, Crash Games etc..Crypto payment/balance system like stake.comI will give full installation.txt to buyer.Escrow - Yes ( Buyer pays )--VPS requirements:2GB of RAMat least 50 GB of free disk space(500GB if you're going to run local crypto nodes instead of using coinbase commerce)CPU that supports AVX and SSE instruction set(check ti with support prior to purchasing, Namecheap VPSes don't support it)Make sure you're running Ubuntu Linux 20.04 LTS or 22.04 LTS.Asking Price - 150$Telegram - ZenX0BetQuoteQuote
